arxiv_idv.title: arXiv identifier
arxiv_idv.description: The arXiv identifier for this version, with a version affix.

submitter_info.title: Submitter
submitter_info.description: Information about the submitter and possible proxy for the submitter.

proxy_name.title: Proxy name
proxy_name.description: Name of the proxy that submitted on the submitter's behalf.

submitted_date.title: Submitted date
submitted_date.description: Date this version was submitted to arXiv.

posted_date.title: Posted date
posted_date.description: Date this version was posted to arXiv, making it publicly available.

license.title: License
license.description: The license associated with the content.

titles.title: Titles
titles.description: The English and non-English versions of the title.

legacy_authors.title: Legacy authors
legacy_authors.description: The legacy authors field, which is an unstructured string.
examples: J. Doe (Cornell University), M. Smith (Stanford University), F. Bar

collaborations.title: Collaborations
collaborations.description: Collaborations associated with this e-print. Should not include 'Collaboration' suffix.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: Comments from authors or arXiv administrators.

author_comments.title: Author comments
author_comments.description: Comments from authors. This field is not intended for soliciting feedback from readers.
examples: references and comments on conformal diagrams added

administrator_comments.title: Administrator comments
examples: This version has been removed because it is in violation of arXiv's copyright policy

legacy_comments.description: Unstructured comments from authors and/or arXiv administrators.
examples: Research work paper, 9 pages, 10 figures, Appendix
25 pages. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:YYMM.NNNNN

journal_ref.title: Journal reference
journal_ref.description: The full bibliographic reference if the article has already appeared in a journal, proceedings, etc.

dois.title: DOIs
dois.description: Publisher- and submitter-provided DOIs for this version.

provider.title: DOI provider
provider.$comment: The provider is not always known, hence optional.

last_updated.description: The time this DOI was last updated by the provider.

keywords.title: List of keywords
keywords.description: A list of individual keywords that may belong to a vocabulary.

related_links.title: Related Links
related_links.$comment: should this be document-specific instead of version-specific?

source_info.title: Source information
source_info.description: Information about the input source files.
